testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome Browser............................................passed When User Opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed And User enter Email id as "admin@yourstore.com" and Enter Password as "admin".passed And User Click on Login button..............................................passed Then Page Title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"..........passed When User click on Logout Link..............................................passed Then After Logout Page Title should be "Your store. Login"..................passed And Close Browser...........................................................passed
